text:
="preserve">Urlabari is a city and municipality in the Morang District in the Koshi Zone of southeastern Nepal that makes it the second largest city in Morang District after Biratnagar. At the time of the 1991 Nepal census, it had a population of 18224. At the time of the 2011 Nepal census, it had a population of 35,166 and 8,165 households.
It is found 60 km eastern part of metropolitan city Biratnagar.
